ぱくぱく: (ぱくぱく) - flapping open and closed (e.g. mouth); heartily (eating)

ぱしる: (ぱしる) - to make do errands; to set to scutwork

ぱたん: (ぱたん) - with a snap/with a bang/with a plonk/with a click; suddenly/all of a sudden

ぱちつかせる: (ぱちつかせる) - to blink repeatedly; to wave repeatedly (e.g. a paper fan)

ぱちり: (パチリ) - (with a) click (e.g. camera shutter); (with a) snap
ぱちん: (ぱちん) - with a click/with a snap; ornamental clip (hair, obi, etc.)

ぱねえ: (ぱネェ) - a lot; to a very great extent; absolutely
ぱらつく: (パラつく) - to sprinkle (e.g. with rain)
ぱらぱら: (ぱらぱら) - disco dancing with synchronized arm motions; falling in (large) drops (e.g. rain, hail)/sprinkle (e.g. rain, salt)/pattering/clattering (e.g. hail); flipping through a book/thumbing through a book/riffling cards; sparse/scattered (e.g. clumps of grass); crumbly (e.g. tofu, cheese, non-sticky rice)/loose and falling apart
ぱらり: (ぱらり) - sprinkling; dropping in small light bits

ぱネェ: (ぱネェ) - a lot; to a very great extent; absolutely

ひいひい: (ひいひい) - whaa whaa; sound of a baby crying
ひえもんどり: (ひえもんどり) - using an enemy's liver for medicinal purposes (Satsuma clan)
